ch0089_41_n/0101_0701_01_10:
You made it, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
I’ve been waiting for you.
ch0089_41_n/0101_0701_02_10:
Would you like to go to a festival with me?
I’ve been looking forward to it for a while now.
ch0089_41_n/7101_0701_01_10:
You should see this outfit. I’m quite impressed
by it.
ch0089_41_n/7101_0701_02_10:
The texture of the cloth is easy on the skin, and it
feels nice and breezy.
ch0089_41_n/7101_0701_03_10:
It must be the culmination of years of research to
find the perfect formula for an optimal design.
ch0089_41_n/7101_0701_04_10:
I imagine it’s the amalgamation of ideas from
those who came before us.
ch0089_41_n/7102_0701_01_10: Zoroark and I have a deep bond.
ch0089_41_n/7102_0701_02_10:
He takes care of his friends and cheers me up
whenever I’m feeling down.
ch0089_41_n/7102_0701_03_10:
I think he feels at ease here on Pasio because I’ve
made so many friends like you.
ch0089_41_n/7103_0701_01_10:
Did I ever mention that I spent a lot of my life
living in the forest and in a castle?
ch0089_41_n/7103_0701_02_10:
That’s why places that are busy and crowded are
very exciting for me.
ch0089_41_n/7104_0701_01_10:
There are a lot of people and Pokémon on Pasio,
aren’t there.
ch0089_41_n/7104_0701_02_10:
That’s why it’s not surprising to me that people
sometimes disagree with one another.
ch0089_41_n/7104_0701_03_10:
However, even those people can watch fireworks
together at a festival, despite their differences.
I suppose it’s because there’s no need to speak.
ch0089_41_n/7105_0701_01_10:
At festivals, there are many booths that sell
different types of foods... But where are you
supposed to eat it?
ch0089_41_n/7105_0701_02_10:
Hm? You’re supposed to eat outside, taking care
not to bump into other people and Pokémon?
ch0089_41_n/7105_0701_03_10: I haven’t done anything like that before.
ch0089_41_n/7105_0701_04_10:
But it does sound fun. Could you teach me how to
do that, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0089_41_n/1701_0701_01_10: Hi there. I’d like you to have this.
ch0089_41_n/1701_0702_01_10: Be careful not to lose it.
ch0089_41_n/2501_0701_01_10:
I heard you can test your luck at festivals with
certain types of games.
ch0089_41_n/2501_0701_02_10:
The future is uncertain until it’s revealed whether
you’ve won or lost...
ch0089_41_n/2501_0701_03_10:
The most exciting part is the anticipation you feel
right before they announce the results.
ch0089_41_n/2501_0702_01_10: In the past, I used to worry about uncertainties.
ch0089_41_n/2501_0702_02_10:
However, I’ve come to realize that within those
uncertainties lies the potential for a brighter future.
ch0089_41_n/2511_0701_01_10:
Back in Unova, I had many friends who would
lend me their power.
ch0089_41_n/2511_0701_02_10:
At the time, I had an aversion to putting Pokémon
in Poké Balls...
ch0089_41_n/2511_0701_03_10:
So I released my friends back into the wild
whenever I finished battling together with them.
ch0089_41_n/2511_0702_01_10:
I wonder if my old friends are traveling with other
Trainers now.
ch0089_41_n/2511_0702_02_10:
If so, I hope they’re happy and living their best
lives together with a Trainer as kind as you are.
ch0089_41_n/3001_0701_01_10:
All the people and Pokémon look excited to get
out and about today. Let’s head out soon.
ch0089_41_n/3003_0701_01_10:
I’m not too familiar with festivals, but I do find
them intriguing—and a bit exciting!
ch0089_41_n/3005_0701_01_10:
The loud booms of a fireworks show at night can
be fun, but I prefer to observe such festivities from
a quiet spot.
